Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
13.10.2014 GB SCR19232 Added task Update CDEP(sql)
10.10.2014 SH SCR19223 Fixed bug according to update of BAD095.PI.DATEUNTIL if CDEP_DATEENDINTERESTCALC = null
03.05.2014 GB SCR18873 Removed CDEP_DEBITINTEREST = Y
01.05.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
21.04.2010 SH SCR15380 Added test PI.DATEFROM <= PI.DATEUNTIL to start BAD095
13.04.2010 SH SCR15431 Replaced hardcoded jobqueue names by logical names
09.11.2009 SH SCR14921 BAD092-14 Added CDEP_DATESTARTINTERESTCALC and
CDEP_DATEENDINTERESTCALC to set BAD095 parameters
02.08.2007 SH SCR12762 BAD092-11 Added test on CDHI_START < v.DATEUNTIL
26.03.2007 SH SCR12347 Changed update of BAD095.PI.DATEFROM in case of
CDEP_DATLASTINTERESTCALC is null --> max(CDEP_START , V.DATEFROM)
22.01.2007 SH SCR12208 Changed update of PI.DATEFROM (= BAD095)
-- Stop program if not end of month
... BAD0994 is called as PC job
... BAD0994 is called as submit serverjob (GB007 turns job to MSGW)
... else continue with client selections
-- Start to select clients for interest calculations, have to sumitted in
jobqueue MGSRVN_1UL (only if BAD094 is called as submit server job)
.. to be sure that that MGSRVN_1UL is released

SQL_STMT_U.val: update :1/cdep set cdep_specinterestcond = 'N' where cdep_admno between 21 and 25 and cdep_specinterestcond = 'Y' and not(cdep_datedeleted is null)

Text.val: (CallProgam of BAD095 only for testing purposes and uses for cross reference)
